title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 522.2 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 522.2 - Applicability

State Regulations

This Part shall apply to all facilities operated or licensed
by the Office of Mental Health. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
522.2

Adopted by

New

York State Register June 1, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 22, eff. 6/1/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
